name: Adult Classes
description: Adult classes are based on curriculum that responds to the needs of our student population. We help students build their English, literacy, and job skills (including digital literacy). Our classes include: English Language/Literacy; Vocational English; the Women’s Initiative (family literacy program); and Citizenship Preparation.
